descriptionTitle: Soli-LMS: A Comprehensive Learning Management System
description: Developed a key component of the Soli-LMS project, focusing on creating and linking project-based learning activities for learners. Implemented a system to connect projects with relevant skills and levels, providing a structured learning path. Explored personalized learning recommendations to enhance the learning experience.

descriptionTitle: Coding Commanders: Water Conservation Solution (SoliHackathon Winner)
description: Won first place at the SoliHackathon with a solution addressing water wastage. Developed an innovative solution that impressed the judges and earned recognition. Explored using sensor data analysis to optimize water usage.

descriptionTitle: Mentorini: A Mentoring Platform Connecting Learners and Experts
description: Developed a web platform for mentorship, connecting students and mentors. Designed the user interface, managed user profiles, and implemented a search system to facilitate meaningful connections. Explored using personalized matching algorithms to enhance the mentoring experience.

descriptionTitle: Coding Commanders: Water Conservation Solution (SoliHackathon Winner)
description: Won first place at the SoliHackathon with a solution addressing water wastage. Developed an innovative solution that impressed the judges and earned recognition. Explored using sensor data analysis to optimize water usage.

url: https://www.example.com/jobmatch (replace with your app URL if available)
descriptionTitle: JobMatch: Streamlining Career Exploration and Development
description: Developed JobMatch, a mobile application designed for an entrepreneurship competition. The app provides a user-friendly platform for searching job offers, internships, courses, and training opportunities. It features efficient filtering based on location and other criteria. JobMatch integrates with partner platforms to offer a comprehensive suite of resources for career advancement.
Built on Next.js and React. A fast and responsive single page application.
